mike evans_tb_15_2025.reason: First game back from collarbone (missed wks 8-14). Pitch count ~40-50% snaps. Pre-injury: 8-11 tgt, 72-83% snaps.

chris godwin jr._tb_15_2025.reason: 4th game back. Snaps: 36%->66%->69%. Targets: 4->5->8. Week 14 had 28.6% target share (near pre-injury 25.6%). Trending to ~75% snaps but production ramping faster.

emeka egbuka_tb_15_2025.reason: Data shows Egbuka maintained 8+ targets regardless of Evans/Godwin availability (22-30% target share). Minimal reduction expected - he's the WR1 now.
